Detailed Description

Expose first party players' information.

Function Documentation

void _UserApiTriggerCallback ( UserApiRefT *  pRef,
uint32_t  uUserIndex,
UserApiEventErrorE  eError,
UserApiEventTypeE  eType,
UserApiUserDataT *  pUserData 
)

Called by update function in the platform specific UserApi modules when a profile or error is ready.

Parameters
*pRef- pointer to UserApiT module reference.
*uUserIndex- The index of the user associated with this profile request.
*eError- A UserApiEventErrorE indicating success for the failure reason.
eType- type of callback
*pUserData- pointer to a populated UserApiUserDataT
Returns
void
Version
05/10/2013 (mcorcoran) - First version
12/10/2013 (amakoukji) - Second version for UserApi second pass

References UserApiRefT::crit, ds_memcpy(), UserApiEventDataT::eError, UserApiEventDataT::eEventType, UserApiEventDetailsT::EndOfList, UserApiEventDataT::EventDetails, UserApiUserContextT::iTotalErrors, UserApiEndOfListT::iTotalErrors, UserApiUserContextT::iTotalReceived, UserApiEndOfListT::iTotalReceived, UserApiUserContextT::iTotalRequested, UserApiEndOfListT::iTotalRequested, NetCritEnter(), NetCritLeave(), pRef, UserApiRefT::pUserCallback, UserApiRefT::pUserData, USERAPI_ERROR_REQUEST_FAILED, USERAPI_EVENT_END_OF_LIST, UserApiRefT::UserContextList, UserApiEventDetailsT::UserData, UserApiRefT::UserPresenceList, UserApiRefT::UserRichPresenceList, and UserApiEventDataT::uUserIndex.

Referenced by _UserApiProcessProfileResponse(), and UserApiUpdate().
